title: Baby murdered by dad in scalding bath writhed in pain as skin slid off her body
text:
Derek Shockley, left, has been jailed for 30 years for murdering 13 month-old daughter Germanii Amarii Stewart by putting her in a bath whose water was so scalding her skin peeled off (Picture: Jacksonville County Sheriff’s Office)

A baby girl was murdered by her dad after he put her in a bath so hot she was left ‘writhing in pain’ with her skin ‘sloughing off her body.’

Germanii Amarii Stewart died on December 27 2018, with the 13 month-old’s dad Derek Shockley, 21, jailed for 30 years on Monday after admitting second-degree murder.

Police called to Germanii’s home in Jacksonville, Arkansas, on December 18 say they found the youngster contorted in agony as her skin peeled off her body, according to a horrific arrest report.

The youngster was rushed to Arkansas Children’s Hospital suffering severe burns to more than a third of her body.

Germanii succumbed to multiple organ failure and septic shock nine days later.

Shockley claimed he’d been cleaning Germanii off in the shower after she pooped herself when her skin started falling off her body.

Investigators discovered the temperature of the water coming from the tap at the time was 153F (67C), with water from the shower head flowing out at 113F (45C).

The killer dad claimed he had been drying Germanii off with towels when he noticed her skin peeling off whenever he’d lift the towel.

His mother Lavern Shockley, 39, said she’d asked Shockley how hot the water had been when he’d washed Germanii.

He’d answered ‘Not very hot at all,’ and did not have any visible injuries, suggesting that Shockley had dunked Germanii in the bath rather than held her under a hot shower.

The Arkansas Democrat-Gazette reported that Shockley will also face a 10 year prison term for shooting a man and battering his sister during a row over stolen cash.

Shockley admitted shooting Hayden Andrew Sheward and assaulting Sheward’s 22 year-old sister during a scuffle in October 2018.

That 10 year sentence will run concurrently to the 30 years Shockley has been ordered to serve for his daughter’s horrific murder.
description: Germanii Amari Stewart died of septic shock after the horrific attack by dad Derek Shockley at their home in Jacksonville, Arkansas
